last_price_tooltip: Fill in the current last price

order_table.opening_volume_tooltips: Opening Volume = Quantity x Opening Price
order_table.closed_volume_tooltips: Closed Volume = Quantity x Closed Price

close_order.confirm_message: Do you want to close your order with ticket #{{value}}?
close_order.future_note: * Eco Close mode will close your order by placing Limit order close to the current price and get a discount on fees compared to normal order. See details at
close_order.request_successfully: Your request of closing an order is processing
close_order.title: Close order

calulator.description: See what the potential risk and reward will be in monetary terms on any give trade. Use our Futures Calculator to establish your potential profit/loss on a future trade. Read
calulator.liq_price_description: Your open positions will be taken into consideration when calculating the liquidation price. Unrealized PNL and maintenance margin of your open position will affect the calculation of liquidation price.

leverage.title: Adjust Leverage
leverage.description: Always control risk when choosing leverage, especially with leverage over 10x

tp_sl.sl_not_set: You have not set stop loss, stop loss order helps you to reduce risk when the market fluctuates
tp_sl.tp_not_set: You have not set take profit, take profit order helps you to optimize profit when trading
tp_sl.is_will: , it will trigger Take Profit Market order to clos this position. Estimate PNL will be
tp_sl.this_setting: This setting applies to the entire position.
tp_sl.automaticcally_cancel: automaticcally cancel after closing the position. A market order is triggerd when the stop price is reached. The order will be rejected if the position size exceeds the Max Market Order by Qty limit.

preferences.order_confirmation_will_be: Order Confirmation will be required every time an order is submitted if this function is enabled. This setting only applies to USD-M-Futures
preferences.in_the_one_way_mode: In the One-way Mode, one contract can only hold positions in one direction.
preferences.in_the_hedge_way_mode: In the Hedge-way Mode, one contract can only hold positions in both long and short directions at the same time, and hedge positions in different directions under the same contract.
preferences.if_there_are_open_positions: If there are open positions or open orders in the contract, you are not allowed to adjust the position mode. Position mode adjustments are effective for all contracts. This setting only applies to USD-M Futures
preferences.notification_limit_is_up: Notification limit is up to 25 per day per user. This includes 5 order types. Take Profit/Stop Lost Limit, Take Profit/Stop Loss Market, and Trailing Stop.
preferences.you_will_be_notified_when: You will be notified when expected funding rate charged reaches.
preferences.you_will_be_notified_of: You will be notifed of the following events via Email / SMS/ Inmail. You can turn the notification on/off. This setting applies to both USD-M Futures and COIN-M Futures

close_all.close_all_modal: Do you want to close all your orders?
close_all.close_loss_modal: Do you want to close all your loss orders?
close_all.close_profit_modal: Do you want to close all your profit orders?
close_all.close_pending_modal: Do you want to close all your pending orders?
close_all.close_active_modal: Do you want to close all your active orders?

invalid_amount_price: You need to enter valid volume and price to use this feature
place_order_success_message: Your request of opening an order is processing
high_volume_note: Risk Warning: Orders with high volume will need longer time to be executed, please manage your positions carefully to reduce risks
high_funding_note: Risk Warning: Marker order request requires longer time to be executed around funding time, please consider carefully before trading.

guide.symbol: To start trading, select your desired trading pair here
guide.side: Choose Buy / Sell option in prediction of asset price increase or decrease respectively
guide.volume: Input amount you want to trade
guide.sl: Choose Take Profit and Stop Loss to manage the profit of the order
guide.tab: Your account details and order list will be displayed here
guide.step_1: To start trading, select your desired trading pair here
guide.step_2: Choose Buy / Sell option in prediction of asset price increase or decrease respectively
guide.step_3: Select the type of order you want to place (Market / Limit or Stop Market)
guide.step_4: Choose the leverage you want to use, high leverage offers higher risk and return, consider carefully
guide.step_5: Enter the trading volume of the order, the volume is calculated as the margin multiplied by the leverage of your choice (Vol = Margin * Leverage)
guide.step_6: Enter Stop-Loss and Take-Profit price for better risk management
guide.step_7: Adjust parameters more intuitively and in detail with this button
guide.step_8: Check the order parameters again and start trading. Wish you a lot of profit from trading Nami Futures!

adjust_margin.not_allow_change_margin: For the safety of your position, Nami does not support margin reduction for positions with leverage over 25x
adjust_margin.max_removable: The maximum margin you can remove is {{max}} VNDC
adjust_margin.temp_future: Currently we do not support removing margin from positions, this feature will be released in the near future

error.INVALID_ORDER_STATUS: This feature only applies to successfully opened positions
error.MODIFY_FUTURES_MARGIN_INVALID_LEVERAGE: For the safety of your position, this feature is not available with current leverage.
error.REMOVE_FUTURES_MARGIN_INVALID_AMOUNT: The amount you want to withdraw exceeds the available margin
error.REMOVE_FUTURES_MARGIN_INVALID_PROFIT_RAT: For the safety of your position, this feature is not supported with the current rate of return.

adjust_margin.add_volume_success_message: Your volume has been added successfully
adjust_margin.partially_closed_success_message: Your partial position have been closed successfully

mobile.confirm_order_message: Do you confirm to place order {{type}} {{symbol}} at the price {{price}}?
mobile.confirm_order_message_market: Do you confirm to place order {{type}} {{symbol}}?
mobile.balance_insufficient: Your balance is not enough, please deposit.
mobile.info_swap_fee: For every active futures position, Nami Exchange applies a swap fee of 0.0015% of position’s volume minus margin for every maintaining hour and is calculated to the position’s PnL
mobile.info_liquidate_fee: For each order liquidated, the liquidation fee is calculated at 1% of the closed volume and is paid by the Futures account balance.
mobile.info_liquidate_price: A price at which position PnL hits negative 100%
mobile.invalid_session_content: Please reload to continue Futures trading
mobile.invalid_nami_frame_user: You are not eligible for this program
mobile.invalid_log_status: Your reward not found please come back later
mobile.tooltip_popup: Choose asset for closing fee to get a corresponding discount and set a default asset for next orders by checking the box below.

close_all_positions.title: Close All Positions
close_all_positions.confirm_description: This is the estimated number of positions and profit. Market price will affect the actual number of closed positions and profit.
close_all_positions.confirm_close_pending_description: All pending positions will be cancelled. Are you sure?

funding_rate_des: The payment rate exchanged between the long and short positions for the next funding. If the funding rate is positive, longs pay shorts. If negative, shorts pay longs.

funding_history_tab.funding_warning_content: Futures trading around the funding threshold with high funding rates contracts carries a lot of risk from the highly volatile market, you may experience bad experiences such as: </br>- Time difference between funding counter and device time vs server time up to 5 seconds </br>- Processing time for market orders (open, close, add volume...) is longer than other times, can be up to 10 seconds </br>- The minimum price gap for trigger prices (with limit orders, SL-TP settings...) can be up to 2% of the market price at the time of setting. </br>Please consider carefully before trading and manage your position well to avoid affecting the trading efficiency, NAO Futures will not be responsible for any loss that occurs when trading during extreme volatile market times.
funding_history_tab.network_warning_content: We are currently acknowledging a significant drop in connection speed from Vietnam to international servers, including the Futures trading system server.  Depending on the device and internet service provider, some users from Vietnam may experience limitations in terms of chart display speed, price update speed or trading processing speed.</br></br>Users who encounter the above problems should consider carefully before trading to minimize risks. We will not be liable for any loss arising from server speed restrictions.</br></br>Please note that not all users from Vietnam face the above restrictions, users can still trade normally if the connection speed to the server is stable.</br></br>Best regards,
funding_history_tab.to_learn_funding: To learn more about Funding Rates, see more at

min_difference_ratio_tooltip: Minimum range by percentage with market price for setting limit price, this index is constantly updated based on market status.
min_order_size_tooltips: Minimum trading volume required to place an order.
max_order_size_tooltips: Maximum trading volume required to place an order.
total_max_trading_volumn_tooltips: Total maximum open trading volume of a trading pair.
max_number_order_tooltips: Maximum number of pending orders and open positions allowed for an account.
min_limit_order_price_tooltips: The minimum price a user can set for a pending order.
max_limit_order_price_tooltips: The maximum price a user can set for a pending order.
liq_fee_rate_tooltips: For each order liquidated, the liquidation fee is calculated at 1% of the closed volume and is paid by the Futures account balance.
max_leverage_tooltips: Maximum leverage allowed at order opening.
swap_fee_tooltips: For every active futures position, Nami Exchange applies a swap fee of 0.0015% of position's volume minus margin for every maintaining hour and is calculated to the position's PNL.
max_order_size_limit_tooltip: Maximum trading volume required to place an Limit order.
max_order_size_market_tooltip: Maximum trading volume required to place an Market or Stop Market order.

terms.title: Terms and Agreements

terms.service: I Accept Nami's Term Of Services.
terms.futures: I Accept Nami's Term Of Futures Trading.

trading_rules_tooltip: Applies to both NAMI Futures and NAO Futures
